channel.title: Comments on: Am I Part of the Problem?
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/am-i-part-of-the-problem/#comment-165">Cava Supernova</a>.
Thank you! It means a lot coming from you. If you're a troglodyte, I wish you had been my ancestral troglodyte. :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Cava Supernova.

Thank you! It means a lot coming from you. If you’re a troglodyte, I wish you had been my ancestral troglodyte. :-)

item.title: By: Cava Supernova
item.dc:creator: Cava Supernova
item.description: Great post - fascinating read. As a troglodyte pervert with very little insight about 'important stuff' it pleases me greatly to read posts by people who are putting some thought into what's going on in the world! Xx
item.content:encoded: Great post – fascinating read. As a troglodyte pervert with very little insight about ‘important stuff’ it pleases me greatly to read posts by people who are putting some thought into what’s going on in the world! Xx
